pages.text: This section lists all of the currently obtainable baubles to utilize in Harken Scythe.$(br2)The Reaper's Ring of Silence is the perfect ring to start off with: This will command your weaponry to be silent and not spawn any essences. Perfect for when you need to utilize the reaping tools for combat only!

pages.title: Ring of Silence
pages.text: And the vision that was planted in my brain$(br)Still remains$(br)Within the Ring of Silence

These trinkets are very popular among Harbingers, as mere contact with essence entities is enough to collect them, while they can store a considerable amount of them.$(br)As these are delicate relics, they cannot be used for direct crucible interactions but rather have their essence transferred by absorbers.

Thanks to an old alliance between the Harbingers and the Withers, it is known that this piece of jewelry can be improved even further. Not only does its capacity increase, also essence seems to get attracted by it.
